body:
Files and functions for with-scope and lookup-slot handling (TurboFan + Ignition + Runtime):

1) src/compiler/bytecode-graph-builder.{cc,h}
- BytecodeGraphBuilder::VisitCreateWithContext
- BytecodeGraphBuilder::VisitLdaLookupSlot
- BytecodeGraphBuilder::VisitLdaLookupSlotInsideTypeof
- BytecodeGraphBuilder::VisitStaLookupSlot
- BytecodeGraphBuilder::VisitPushContext
- BytecodeGraphBuilder::VisitPopContext
- Helpers:
  * BuildLdaLookupContextSlot(ContextKind, TypeofMode)
  * BuildLdaLookupGlobalSlot(TypeofMode)
  * CheckContextExtensions(uint32_t), CheckContextExtensionsSlowPath(uint32_t)
  * CheckContextExtensionAtDepth(...)
  * TryGetScopeInfo()
  * BuildLdaLookupSlot(TypeofMode)

2) src/compiler/js-generic-lowering.{cc,h}
- JSGenericLowering::LowerJSCreateWithContext -> Runtime::kPushWithContext
- JSGenericLowering::LowerJSHasContextExtension (UNREACHABLE; eliminated earlier)
- JSGenericLowering::LowerJSLoadGlobal / LowerJSStoreGlobal (feedback vector IC usage)
- JSGenericLowering::LowerJSToObject (REPLACE_STUB_CALL(ToObject))
- Generic lowering of JSCallRuntime when Load/StoreLookupSlot nodes appear (from bytecode builder as JSCallRuntime)

3) src/compiler/js-operator.{h,cc}
- JSOperatorBuilder::CreateWithContext(ScopeInfoRef)
- JSOperatorBuilder::HasContextExtension(size_t depth)
- JSOperatorBuilder::{LoadContext,LoadScriptContext,StoreContext,StoreScriptContext}
- JSOperatorBuilder::LoadGlobal(NameRef,FeedbackSource,TypeofMode), StoreGlobal(...)
- JSOperatorBuilder::ToObject(), ToName(), ToNumber()/ToNumeric()

4) src/interpreter/interpreter-generator.cc
- IGNITION_HANDLER(CreateWithContext)
- IGNITION_HANDLER(LdaLookupSlot)
- IGNITION_HANDLER(LdaLookupSlotInsideTypeof)
- IGNITION_HANDLER(LdaLookupContextSlot)
- IGNITION_HANDLER(LdaLookupScriptContextSlot)
- IGNITION_HANDLER(LdaLookupContextSlotInsideTypeof)
- IGNITION_HANDLER(LdaLookupScriptContextSlotInsideTypeof)
- IGNITION_HANDLER(LdaLookupGlobalSlot)
- IGNITION_HANDLER(LdaLookupGlobalSlotInsideTypeof)
- IGNITION_HANDLER(StaLookupSlot)
- IGNITION_HANDLER(PushContext)
- IGNITION_HANDLER(PopContext)
- IGNITION_HANDLER(ToObject)
- InterpreterLookupContextSlotAssembler::LookupContextSlot uses GotoIfHasContextExtensionUpToDepth
- InterpreterLookupGlobalAssembler::LookupGlobalSlot uses GotoIfHasContextExtensionUpToDepth + IC fast path for globals

5) src/runtime/runtime-scopes.cc
- Runtime_LoadLookupSlot
- Runtime_LoadLookupSlotInsideTypeof
- Runtime_LoadLookupSlotForCall (+ _Baseline variant)
- Runtime_StoreLookupSlot_Sloppy
- Runtime_StoreLookupSlot_Strict
- Runtime_StoreLookupSlot_SloppyHoisting
- Runtime_PushWithContext (allocates WithContext)
- Runtime_DeleteLookupSlot
- Key helpers: LoadLookupSlot / StoreLookupSlot resolve chains; context extension object creation and gating

Additional related:
- src/compiler/bytecode-graph-builder.cc contains fast-path gating via JSHasContextExtension + TryGetScopeInfo and dependency on EmptyContextExtension
- ic/accessor-assembler.cc provides GotoIfHasContextExtensionUpToDepth used by interpreter fast path
- objects/scope-info.{h,cc} HasContextExtensionSlot bit; contexts-inl.h
- js-typed-lowering.cc handles JSHasContextExtension elimination

IDs/snippets to follow in more detailed entries.
explanation: High-level index of locations and functions required to study with-contexts and lookup-slot operations across TurboFan, Ignition, and Runtime. Useful as a map before diving into detailed snippets.
file_line: multiple files; tip-of-tree under src/ paths
